String.name: First Effect - Pounding VII
String.tooltip: Increases damage to monsters by $value.

String.name: First Effect - Bitter VII
String.tooltip: Increases Crit Power against monsters by 1.52 when attacking from behind.

String.name: First Effect - Slaying VII
String.tooltip: Increases Crit Power against monsters by 1.74 when below 50% HP.

String.name: First Effect - Furious VII
String.tooltip: Increases damage by $value when below 50% HP.

String.name: First Effect - Focused VII
String.tooltip: Increases Crit Power against enraged monsters by 1.88.

String.name: First Effect - Virulent VII
String.tooltip: Crits to knocked-down opponents apply $H_W_GOODPoison VII$COLOR_END.

String.name: First Effect - Brutal VII
String.tooltip: Increases damage to knocked-down opponents by $value.

String.name: First Effect - Cruel VII
String.tooltip: Increases Crit Power after knocking down an opponent. Applies $H_W_GOODCruelty VII$COLOR_END.

String.name: First Effect - Forceful VII
String.tooltip: Crits increase Power when attacking from behind. Applies $H_W_GOODForcefulness VII$COLOR_END.

String.name: First Effect - Savage VII
String.tooltip: Increases Crit Power by 1.32 when attacking from behind.

String.name: First Effect - Cunning VII
String.tooltip: Increases maximum MP by $value.

String.name: First Effect - Infused VII
String.tooltip: Replenishes 255 MP when knocked down.

String.name: First Effect - Glistening VII
String.tooltip: Crits replenish 249 MP when attacking from behind.

String.name: First Effect - Swift VII
String.tooltip: Increases Movement Speed by $value while in combat.

String.name: First Effect - Brilliant VII
String.tooltip: Replenishes $value MP per $tickInterval.

String.name: First Effect - Carving VII
String.tooltip: Increases the chance to crit by 3.3%.

String.name: First Effect - Salivating VII
String.tooltip: Replenishes 89 MP when attacking a player.

String.name: First Effect - Threatening VII
String.tooltip: Increases aggro by $value.

String.name: First Effect - Hardy VII
String.tooltip: Reduces damage from monsters by $value.

String.name: First Effect - Protective VII
String.tooltip: Increases the chance to resist crits by $value when below 50% HP.

String.name: First Effect - Resolute VII
String.tooltip: Reduces damage taken by $value when below 50% HP.

String.name: First Effect - Poised VII
String.tooltip: Reduces damage from enraged monsters by $value.

String.name: First Effect - Empyrean VII
String.tooltip: Applies $H_W_GOODWarding VII$COLOR_END when knocked down by enraged monsters.

String.name: First Effect - Warding VII
String.tooltip: Applies $H_W_GOODWarding VII$COLOR_END when knocked down ($prob chance).

String.name: First Effect - Inspiring VII
String.tooltip: Applies $H_W_GOODHP Recovery VII$COLOR_END when knocked down ($prob chance).

String.name: First Effect - Relentless VII
String.tooltip: Increase maximum HP by $value.

String.name: First Effect - Fleetfoot VII
String.tooltip: Increases Movement Speed by $value while out of combat.

String.name: First Effect - Vigorous VII
String.tooltip: Recovers $value HP per $tickInterval.

String.name: First Effect - Grieving VII
String.tooltip: Replenishes 117 MP when attacked by a player.

String.name: First Effect - Wrath of the Warden VII
String.tooltip: Increases Crit Power by +1.66 times while attacking monster from the front.

String.name: First Effect - Judgment VII
String.tooltip: Increases Crit Power by +1.52 times when making ranged attacks on monsters from the side or rear.

String.name: Second Effect - Glistening VII
String.tooltip: Crits replenish 60 MP when attacking from behind.

String.name: Second Effect - Cunning VII
String.tooltip: Increases maximum MP by $value.

String.name: Second Effect - Infused VII
String.tooltip: Replenishes 63 MP when knocked down.

String.name: Second Effect - Salivating VII
String.tooltip: Replenishes 21 MP when attacking a player.

String.name: Second Effect - Brutal VII
String.tooltip: Increases damage to knocked-down opponents by $value.

String.name: Second Effect - Brilliant VII
String.tooltip: Replenishes $value MP per $tickInterval.

String.name: Second Effect - Swift VII
String.tooltip: Increases Movement Speed by $value while in combat.

String.name: Second Effect - Poised VII
String.tooltip: Reduces damage from enraged monsters by $value.

String.name: Second Effect - Resolute VII
String.tooltip: Reduces damage taken by $value when below 50% HP.

String.name: Second Effect - Grieving VII
String.tooltip: Replenishes 28 MP when attacked by a player.

String.name: Second Effect - Protective VII
String.tooltip: Increases the chance to resist crits by $value when below 50% HP.

String.name: Second Effect - Relentless VII
String.tooltip: Increase maximum HP by $value.

String.name: Second Effect - Vigorous VII
String.tooltip: Recovers $value HP per $tickInterval
